txt.en: Olwen nods as you tell her that things are not always as they seem, especially not hobbits, who are made of sterner stuff than you might expect. You tell her about the time the Great Smials were haunted by the Ghost of the Old Took. 'Really?' she asks, quite alarmed. 'It was a real ghost?' 'No,' you respond, 'it was a squirrel.'
Things are not always as they seem!
